name: the one where Ricardo wants to register a new pet using the clinic API
scenarioId: classpath:features/pets/pets_management:the one where Ricardo wants to register a new pet using the clinic API
methodName: the one where Ricardo wants to register a new pet using the clinic API

testSteps.description:
Given Ricardo has registered the following owner in the system
| firstName | lastName | address | city | phone |
| Michael | Jackson | neverland-ranch 123 | Los Angeles | 1234567890 |

When he sends a request to register the following pet for Michael Jackson using the clinic API
| name | birthDate | type |
| Killer | 2015-01-20 | dog |

children.description: Ricardo registers a new Pet for Michael Jackson using the API

testSteps.description: Then the system should return a 204 response code

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the response status should be (204)

testSteps.description: And the information of the pet should be added to the owner information

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the pets information
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the pets information
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to manage the pets information
  In order to be able to add new pets to owners registered in the system
  Or edit the information of the pets

title: the one where Ricardo wants to register a new pet using the clinic API

rule.name: The system should allow to register a new pet in the system
rule.description: Web form uses the following format for the birthDate: MM-dd-yyyy
